citeinfo.origin: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit
citeinfo.title: Wild Rice Lakes Identified by DNR Wildlife

pubinfo.publish: Minnesota DNR - Division of Fish & Wildlife - Wildlife Unit

descript.abstract: This is a polygon coverage of Wild Rice Lakes and Rivers in Minnesota. Lakes and rivers were selected out from the DNR 100k Lakes and Rivers shapefile based upon intersection with nri_wricept2 .
descript.purpose: This layer was created to help resource managers identify wild rice lakes and rivers for wildlife habitat restoration and enhancement, and for rice management.

theme.themekey: Hydrography, wild rice, wild rice lakes, wild rice rivers, wildlife, habitat,

dataqual.logic: Data are topologically correct using ArcView 3.x.

horizpa.horizpar: Source layer lake_wricepy2: See metadata for DNR 100k Lakes and Rivers.
